name: agent-shepherd
description: Orchestration system for AI coding agents across Beads issues using OpenCode

scripts.build: bun run build:ui && bun build src/cli/index.ts --outfile bin/ashep --target bun --format esm
scripts.build:ui: bun build src/ui/AgentShepherdFlow.tsx --outdir dist --target browser --format iife --minify --define:import.meta.env={MODE:\"production\"} && sed -i.bak 's/import\.meta\.env?import\.meta\.env\.MODE:void 0/false/g' dist/AgentShepherdFlow.js && rm -f dist/AgentShepherdFlow.js.bak
